issue.title: [Java] ComplexCopier does incorrect copy for Map nullable info
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7467](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7467). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The `MapVector` and its 'value' vector are nullable, and its `structVector` and 'key' vector are non-nullable.

However, the `MapVector` generated by ComplexCopier has all nullable fields which is not correct.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7467?focusedCommentId=17031150) by Bryan Cutler (bryanc):*
Issue resolved by pull request 6094
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6094>
